Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV8rawV.name: rawValue
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV8rawV.abstract: The raw value of the option set.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV8rawV.name: init(rawValue:)
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV8rawV.abstract: Initialize the option set via a raw value.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAVyAByx.name: init(_:)
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAVyAByx.abstract: Initialize the option set via a case of the generic enum type.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV12arr.name: init(arrayLiteral:)
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV12arr.abstract: Initialize the option set via a combination of multiple cases of the generic enum type.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV3allA.name: all
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV3allA.abstract: Convenience property of an instance containing all possible options.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV29all.name: allCombinationsContainingSelf
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV29all.abstract: Convenience property returning all possible option combinations containing self, sorted by their raw values ascendingly.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV13all.name: allContaining(_:)
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV13all.abstract: Convenience method returning all possible instances containing the given option, sorted by their raw values ascendingly.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV13all.name: allContaining(_:)
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV13all.abstract: Convenience method returning all possible instances containing the given option, sorted by their raw values ascendingly.

Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV10dec.name: decomposed
Structs/Options.html#/s:7OptionsAAV10dec.abstract: Convenience method returning an array of all cases contained in self, ordered by their respective option’s raw value.
